author: Barbara Shecter
title: Twenty per cent of Canadians would run out of cash in a month if laid off now: survey
description: Only a third believe they would be able to weather the storm for a year or more
content:
One in five Canadians would burn through all their available cash sources within a month if put out of work by efforts to slow the spread of the coronavirus pandemic, according to a new online survey conducted by DART & maru/Blue.
